amendment.description: To extend certain supplemental agriculture disaster assistance programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3338.
Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3395.
Point of order that emergency designations within the amendment violate the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3367.

Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3367 (the sections within the amendment regarding emergency designations) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 40. Record Vote Number: 246.
The emergency designations within amendment SA 3367 were stricken.
Proposed amendment SA 3367 withdrawn in Senate.
